Research Interests:
Parallel & distributed computer architectures; network of workstations (NOWs)/clusters; communication
networks &communication mechanisms; resource management (scheduling); QoSsupport inclusters and
Internet; performance evaluation; fault-tolerant comput ing; mobile computing; multimedia systems.
